SampleID.help_tip: Unique sample tracking ID for your project. This should be a location name used to describe where you sampled (country or region), the year, and a sample number. I.e Patagonia22_1

Site_name.help_tip: Optional, the region or local name of site collected. Can be the same name for multiple samples.

Latitude.help_tip: Latitude of coordinates measured using WGS1984 (default on most GPS). Ideally in decimal format

Longitude.help_tip: Longitude of coordinates measured using WGS1984 (default on most GPS). Ideally in decimal format

Vegetation.help_tip: List of names of local vegetation, if names unknown describe (trees, grass, forbs, etc)

Land_use.help_tip: Land use category of the site.

Agricultural_land.help_tip: Was the land where the sample taken agricultural?

Treatments.help_tip: Optional. Short description if any treatments were applied to the land for study (e.g. pesticide, drought)

Grid_Size.help_tip: Size of your sampling grid. 30m is the standard

Soil_depth.help_tip: Depth of soil core. 5-10cm is the SPUN standard

Drying.help_tip: If airdried, select time drying. Airdrying includes drying with silica gel. Select ‘No’ if no airdrying carried out

Date_collected.help_tip: Date the sample was collected. Must be DD/MM/YYYY format

Extraction_method.help_tip: Kit or protocol used for DNA extraction. ‘Conventional extraction’ refers to a laboratory protocol using common buffers and solutions (such a SDS, phenol). Conventional extraction, CTAB refers to a laboratory protocol using common buffers and solutions in addition to the CTAB buffer.

Elevation.help_tip: Elevation in meters above sea level

Sample_or_Control.help_tip: Indicate ‘True sample' if the sample is a collected soil sample, 'Control' if sample is a negative control

Region_1.help_tip: Primary region of the fungal rDNA operon to be amplified

Primer_set_1.help_tip: First primer set used for amplicon sequencing, if applicable.

Region_2.help_tip: Secondary region of the fungal rDNA operon to be amplified

Primer_set_2.help_tip: Secondary primer set used for amplicon sequencing, if applicable.

Expedition_lead.help_tip: Name of leader and Underground Explorer grant winner

Collaborators.help_tip: List of names of local collaborators for this project. (Max 150 char)

SequencingRun.help_tip: Leave blank unless project samples run across multiple different sequencing runs.

Notes.help_tip: Any additional notes about the sample.
